list_definition.definition: to raise (to a higher rank or position)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was promoted to head teacher.

list_definition.definition: to encourage, organize, or help the progress of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He worked hard to promote peace / this scheme.

list_definition.definition: to encourage the buying of; to advertise

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We are promoting a new brand of soap powder.
